channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260116.2)
item.description:
What's New

Refactor: Move Firefox address bar detection to hardcoded logic

  • Remove Firefox Address Bar Window Title Rules (Selection and AX Direct variants)
  • Add hardcoded Firefox address bar detection using isFirefoxStyleAddressBar()
  • Firefox address bar now uses axDirect method (same as Dia browser)
  • Detection via AXDOMIdentifier: 'urlbar-input'
  • Add GitHub Actions workflow for automated builds
  • Add secrets setup documentation

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
